Package cryptoTrader.strategy

Interface Strategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
StrategyA, StrategyB, StrategyC, StrategyD
public interface Strategy
Broker Class, This is an abstract class for the Strategy
Author:
Gleb Zvonkov

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String buyOrSell()
    Method to check whether we buy or sell according to the strategy
    java.lang.String getCoin()
    Getter Method that returns the coin to buy
    int getPrice()
    Getter method that returns the price of the coin to buy
    int getQuantity()
    Getter method that returns how many coins we buy or sell (i.e.
    boolean perform​(Broker context)
    This uses the strategy design pattern since different perform methods are applied depending on the context This method exists in all Strategy classes

  • Method Details

    • perform

      boolean perform​(Broker context)
      This uses the strategy design pattern since different perform methods are applied depending on the context This method exists in all Strategy classes
      Parameters:
      context -
      Returns:
      true if successful in performing strategy and false otherwise

    • getCoin

      java.lang.String getCoin()
      Getter Method that returns the coin to buy
      Returns:
      Name of coin to buy

    • buyOrSell

      java.lang.String buyOrSell()
      Method to check whether we buy or sell according to the strategy
      Returns:
      "buy" if we buy or "sell" if we are selling

    • getQuantity

      int getQuantity()
      Getter method that returns how many coins we buy or sell (i.e. the quantity)
      Returns:
      Number of coins that we buy or sell

    • getPrice

      int getPrice()
      Getter method that returns the price of the coin to buy
      Returns:
      Price of the coin to buy
